info.name: Firefox - Transparent Bookmarks Bar
info.description:
Simply brings transparency to the bookmarks bar.
Requires a glass-enabling extention, eg. 'GlasserPojo' <http://tinyurl.com/nnmyuo>
Ensure that the "Bookmarks Toolbar" is enabled

(Check out user 11968's " style 8620 " and " style 14193 " for the combination navigation pad)
